question: You have rented an apartment recently, but you are facing some problems. Write a letter to the landlord:•	Describe the details of the problems•	How are these affecting your family•	Ask for possible solutions
text: I am writing to file a complaint about several circumstances that we are facing in our new apartment. Primary, let me introduce myself, I am Ghina Tarhini, and I have rented the flat last month to live with my parents.

The main problem started when the storm began by which rainwater is entering from a couple of windows located in the bedrooms. Moreover, humidity is appearing on certain external walls of the apartment that generates a bad smell in the home.

Unfortunately, my parents are suffering from allergic symptoms due to the odour that will affect their respiratory system for a long period. Furthermore, the cold inside the bedrooms is unbearable as a result of the water seepage that is freezing the floor.

I would suggest that you contact a specialist in order to fix the windows as soon as possible. Additionally, I kindly request you to send a painter to inspect the walls and suggest a viable solution for the problem.
Your prompt action is highly required.
